scripts.postinstall: mkdir -p public/vendor && (curl -fsSL https://unpkg.com/@livekit/client@2.15.7/dist/livekit-client.umd.min.js -o public/vendor/livekit-client.umd.min.js || curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/livekit/client-sdk-js/v2.15.7/dist/livekit-client.umd.min.js -o public/vendor/livekit-client.umd.min.js || wget -qO public/vendor/livekit-client.umd.min.js https://unpkg.com/@livekit/client@2.15.7/dist/livekit-client.umd.min.js || wget -qO public/vendor/livekit-client.umd.min.js https://raw.githubusercontent.com/livekit/client-sdk-js/v2.15.7/dist/livekit-client.umd.min.js)
